problem.markdown:
>>A certain machine produces 300 nails per minute. At this rate, how long will it take the machine to produce enough nails to fill 5 boxes of nails if each box will contain 250 nails? (Answer in decimal form, rounded to the nearest hundredth)<< = 4.17 min
[explanation] Total number of nails to be produced divided by the number of nails produced per minute.
problem.p: A certain machine produces 300 nails per minute. At this rate, how long will it take the machine to produce enough nails to fill 5 boxes of nails if each box will contain 250 nails? (Answer in decimal form, rounded to the nearest hundredth)

problem.p: Total number of nails to be produced divided by the number of nails produced per minute.
